description: Comprehensive water treatment costs by sector with technology breakdowns

cost_components: Total system CAPEX (equipment + civil + installation + engineering + contingency)

ai_usage_optimizations.sector_keys: Normalized for easy matching (DAIRY_INDUSTRY, TEXTILE_WASTEWATER, etc.)
ai_usage_optimizations.cost_curves: Sorted by flow rate for easy interpolation
ai_usage_optimizations.technology_lists: Available technologies per sector for validation
ai_usage_optimizations.complete_data: All financial components included for comprehensive analysis

POWER_PLANT_COOLING_WATER.description: Power Plant Cooling Water wastewater treatment

usage_guidelines.capex_per_m3d: Capital cost per m/day capacity - includes complete treatment system
usage_guidelines.opex_per_m3: Operating cost per m treated - annual operational expenses
usage_guidelines.interpolation: Use linear interpolation between flow rate data points
usage_guidelines.sector_selection: Choose most similar industrial sector for accurate estimates
usage_guidelines.technology_details: Use for validating total costs or designing treatment trains

examples.interpolation_example: For 150 m/day dairy: interpolate between 50 m/day ($422.52/m/day) and 200 m/day ($263.65/m/day)
examples.sector_matching: Food Processing  DAIRY_INDUSTRY or FOOD_PROCESSING, Chemical plant  CHEMICAL_MANUFACTURING
examples.validation: Sum individual technologies should approximate total sector cost
